text:
@DonaldJTrumpJr 137,000 dead DimSon Dumbling.
They won't come back.
You can rebuild statues.

It won't add much to the $26+ trillion national debt your babbling idiot of a father caused by golfing instead of fighting COVID19.

Of course he could also claw back some of the Mar A Lago tax cuts.
